nodes.text: Star Wars Kids was a children's magazine series published by Scholastic from September 1999 to November 2000 as a companion piece to the Star Wars: Episode I Adventures young-readers series and roleplaying game. The magazine lasted for fifteen issues, and each came packaged with a new mission set for Episode I Adventures.

Star Wars Kids ran concurrently with an identically titled magazine series, published by The Fan Club, Inc. from 1998 to 2000, and succeeded Scholastic's original Star Wars Kids magazine series, published from 1997 to 1999 as a companion piece to the Star Wars Missions roleplaying game.
